welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Young Association for Economic Growth in Kurdistan
footerMessage: Young Association for Economic Growth in Kurdistan. All rights reserved.

about.missionDescription: The mission of KKYA is to establish a dynamic bridge between Korea and the Kurdistan Region, fostering mutual understanding, collaboration, and growth through cultural, educational, technological, and professional exchanges.
about.historyDescription: The Korea Kurdistan Youth Association (KKYA) was initiated by his excellency Consul General of the Republic of Korea in Erbil, who started its establishment on September 18, 2024. The KKYA’s mission is to foster a lasting and vibrant connection between Korea and the Kurdistan Region of Iraq, promoting mutual understanding, collaboration, and development.
about.structurePoint1: Executive Committee: Leads KKYA with roles like Chairman, Coordinator, Financier, and Secretary, setting policies and strategic goals.
about.structurePoint2: Departments: Specialized units (e.g., Cultural, Education, Technology, etc.) manage events, training, media, and member engagement.
about.structurePoint3: Advisory Board: Optional, providing expert guidance from Korean and Kurdish professionals across various sectors.

eventsPage.upcomingDescription: Join our events and workshops to foster cultural exchange, innovation, and collaborative growth between Korea and Kurdistan.

home.heroTitle: Welcome to Korea Kurdistan Youth Association (KKYA)
home.heroSubtitle: Building a bridge of mutual understanding and collaboration between Korea and the Kurdistan Region through cultural, educational, and professional exchanges.
home.aboutSubtitle: Our mission is to foster lasting collaboration between Korea and Kurdistan, empowering youth through cultural exchange, skill development, and innovative projects that drive mutual growth and prosperity.
home.missionDesc: Empowering youth through cultural exchange, skill development, and collaborative projects.
home.visionDesc: Creating a dynamic and lasting bridge between Korea and Kurdistan.
home.partnershipsDesc: Fostering strategic alliances for mutual growth and innovation.
home.testimonial2Quote: An amazing opportunity to learn and grow.

membership.title: Become a Member
membership.description: Join our mission to bridge Korea and Kurdistan through cultural, educational, and professional exchanges. Apply below to become a member and contribute to mutual growth and understanding.
membership.submitErrorMessage: There was an error submitting your application. Please try again later.
